intro: This document serves as the Product User Manual (PUM) for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) Natura 2000 (N2K) product, providing detailed land cover and land use (LC/LU) data for grassland-rich Natura 2000 sites across Europe. The manual details the product's characteristics, methodology, and potential applications, focusing on the technical aspects of the product, such as its nomenclature, classification system, data structure, quality assessment and delivery format. It aims to guide users in effectively utilising the N2K product for environmental monitoring, habitat conservation assessment and biodiversity analysis.
